about.shortBio: Kanad Kapil is a student and web developer currently pursuing B.Tech (CSE) from Lovely Professional University (LPU), Punjab.
about.description: Kanad Kapil is an enthusiastic, reliable, and self-motivated individual with a passion for building scalable and high-performance web applications. Currently a Final Year B.Tech student, he specializes in modern web technologies including Next.js 15, React, and TypeScript. His technical journey is marked by a unique blend of full-stack engineering and deep data insights, having developed everything from premium e-commerce frontends to complex bio-informatics visualization tools. Beyond the terminal, Kanad is a polymath who finds balance in artistic expression; he is a Bengali writer, singer, and violinist. He believes that the disciplined structure of music and literature directly informs his approach to clean, maintainable, and creative code. Whether optimizing a MERN stack application's SEO-friendly architecture or performing Exploratory Data Analysis for protein sequence analysis, Kanad embraces challenges and works continuously toward his dual goal of industrial excellence and a long-term academic career as a professor.

sections.title: Technical Vision
sections.content: To merge full-stack engineering with deep data insights, building systems that are not just functional but intelligently architected and SEO-optimized.

sections.title: Industry Goals
sections.content: Seeking hands-on experience in enterprise-scale application development, performance optimization, and data-driven decision systems.

sections.title: Academic Aspirations
sections.content: A long-term commitment to research and education, with the ultimate goal of becoming a professor in Computer Science to inspire future engineers.

sections.title: Creative Identity
sections.content: Bengali writer, singer, and violinist. I believe creativity fuels better engineering, structured thinking, and a unique perspective on problem-solving.

certificates.title: Bangladesh Youth Association for Cancer Awareness

projects.title: Protein Sequence Analysis
projects.desc: A sophisticated EDA and visualization platform for structural bioinformatics, focused on bridging the sequence-structure gap using BiLSTM networks.

projects.title: AlgoViz
projects.desc: Interactive algorithm visualization platform designed to simplify complex logic through real-time graphical representations of sorting and pathfinding.

projects.title: React Note Card
projects.desc: A productivity-focused note-taking application using a modern card-based UI, optimized for quick reflections and organized data entry.

projects.title: Interactive Profile Card
projects.desc: A high-end, glassmorphic profile component showcasing advanced CSS techniques and responsive layout patterns.

projects.title: FlipCards Animation
projects.desc: A showcase of pure CSS 3D transformation and flipping animations, demonstrating complex state-driven transitions without heavy JS libraries.

projects.title: IPL 2025 Bowler Stats
projects.desc: Real-time cricket analytics dashboard providing deep insights into bowler performance stats for the 2025 IPL season using Streamlit.

projects.title: Brainfuck Interpreter
projects.desc: A web-based interpreter for the Brainfuck esoteric programming language, featuring real-time memory visualization.

projects.title: CodeLanguage UI
projects.desc: A modular syntax highlighting and code presentation tool designed for educational documentation and technical writing.

vision.manifesto: Engineering is not just about building things; it's about understanding the fundamental laws that govern logic and data, and using them to solve human-centric problems at scale.
vision.currentDiving: Currently diving deep into Large Language Model architectures, Distributed Systems, and the synergies between AI and Web Engineering.

points.title: Research Interests
points.desc: Exploring the synergy between Distributed Systems and Machine Learning. Interested in optimizing large-scale data processing pipelines and neural network inference at the edge.

points.title: Long-Term Goal: Professor
points.desc: Aspiring to transition into academia to inspire the next generation of engineers. I aim to bridge the gap between high-level theory and industrial-scale implementation.

points.title: Teaching Philosophy
points.desc: Learning by doing. I believe in structured, project-based education that emphasizes first principles and critical thinking over rote memorization.
